channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: White House slams Mamdani's 'completely irresponsible' comments linking Trump to threats against voters

item.title: Roelof Botha steps aside as Sequoia’s steward, passing the role to Alfred Lin and Pat Grady
item.description: After nearly a decade at the helm of Sequoia Capital, Roelof Botha will step aside as “steward” of the legendary Silicon Valley VC firm.

item.title: Marco Rubio to address bipartisan group of senators on Capitol Hill over drug boat strikes
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio will be on Capitol Hill on Wednesday to brief lawmakers on the U.S. military strikes on alleged drug boats.

item.title: How Princeton University Hijacked a Free-Speech Event
item.description: I helped create Princeton’s free-expression event for freshman orientation. The university turned it into yet another indoctrination session.

item.title: Report: Radical Leftist Groups Perpetuate Homeless Crisis For Their Own Benefit
item.description: The industrial homelessness complex, in many cases, has used advocacy for the homeless as a front for all kinds of radical causes.

item.title: Gen Z dreams of a ‘Ralph Lauren Christmas’ in a dollar store American economy
item.description: A "Ralph Lauren Christmas" doesn't have to be sourced from a Ralph Lauren store. It's more a state of mind, and it's more popular than ever.

item.title: The Attacks On Heritage And Kevin Roberts Are Really About Foreign Policy And J.D. Vance
item.description: Genuine concern about antisemitism on the right is being hijacked by neocons to attack J.D. Vance in hopes of re-taking control of the GOP.

item.title: Justice Jackson Is The Supreme Court’s Mean Girl

item.title: ‘You will see mass chaos. You will see mass flight delays. You’ll see mass cancellations’: Transportation Secretary desperate for shutdown to end
